required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Management of Mixed-Phenotype Acute Leukemia in the East of France
clinical_study.official_title: Management of Mixed-Phenotype Acute Leukemia in the East of France

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical presentation and management of Mixed-Phenotype Acute leukemia (MPAL) is heterogeneous. This descriptive observationnal study aims to review MPAL cases in the East of France based on a 10-year multicentre retrospective collection.

primary_outcome.measure: Age of the patients when diagnosed with MPAL
Sex of the patients when diagnosed with MPAL
City of the hematology unit in charge of each patient for the treatment of MPAL
primary_outcome.description: Nancy, Metz-Thionville, Reims, Strasbourg, Mulhouse, Dijon or Besançon

primary_outcome.measure: MPAL rate in the each hematology unit
primary_outcome.description: Rate of MPAL out of the total number of patients diagnosed with acute leukemia in each hematology unit

primary_outcome.measure: Date of MPAL diagnosis for each patient
Type of MPAL for each patient
primary_outcome.description: De novo MPAL or secondary to myelodysplasia MPAL

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of blood blasts for each patient at diagnosis of MPAL
primary_outcome.description: On the first blood sample analyzed

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of medullar blasts for each patient at diagnosis of MPAL
primary_outcome.description: On the first bone marrow sample analyzed

primary_outcome.measure: Cytologic characteristics: type of myeloid markers at diagnosis for each patient
primary_outcome.description: Presence or not of myeloid markers generally sought in the diagnosis of acute leukaemias

primary_outcome.measure: Cytologic characteristics: type of B lymphoid markers at diagnosis for each patient
primary_outcome.description: Presence or not of B lymphoid markers generally sought in the diagnosis of acute leukaemias

primary_outcome.measure: Cytologic characteristics: type of T lymphoid markers
primary_outcome.description: Presence or not of T lymphoid markers generally sought in the diagnosis of acute leukemias

primary_outcome.measure: Medullar MPO positivity percentage at diagnosis for each patient
primary_outcome.description: If performed on the bone marrow sample used to confirm the diagnosis

primary_outcome.measure: Genetic characteristics on the caryotype at diagnosis for each patient
primary_outcome.description: Presence or not of caryotypic abnormalities generally sought in the diagnosis of acute leukemias

primary_outcome.measure: Genetic characteristics on molecular biology analysis at diagnosis for each patient
primary_outcome.description: Presence or not of molecular biology abnormalities generally sought in the diagnosis of acute leukemias

primary_outcome.measure: Classification of biphenotypic acute leukemia (BAL) according to the EGIL 1998 criterias at diagnosis
Classification of MPAL according to the WHO 2008 criterias at diagnosis
Type of treatments and dates of the first day of every treatment line for each patient
Medullar response for every treatments line for each patient
primary_outcome.description: Complete cytological and molecular response or treatment failure

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment including allogenic hematopoietic stem cells transplant (HSCT) (yes or no) with type of conditionning regimen for each patient
primary_outcome.description: High-dose, reduced-intensity or nonmyeloablative conditioning regimens with or without total body irradiation

primary_outcome.measure: HSCT complicated with acute and/or chronic graft-versus-host disease with severity grade and treatments for each patient
primary_outcome.description: Diagnosis of GVHD according to Filipovich criterias (BMT 2005); Severity grade according to Seattle criterias; Type of treatments: steroids, other immunosuppressive agents, extracorporeal photopheresis

secondary_outcome.measure: Date of every relapse for each patient

secondary_outcome.description: Secondary to leukemia, treatment or other cause

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients from one of the following 7 hospitals : Nancy, Metz-Thionville, Reims, Strasbourg, Mulhouse, Dijon, Besançon

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients over 18 years of age
- Diagnosis of biphenotypic acute leukemia or mixed-phenotype acute leukemia between 2008 and 2018
